The Email Finder & Email Hunter extension simplifies the process of collecting email addresses from websites. By automatically extracting email addresses from any page you visit, it saves time and increases productivity. Once installed, it runs in the background and collects emails, displaying them in the browser toolbar. You can quickly export or copy these emails in TXT format for outreach or lead generation.

Key Features:
ðŸš€Automatic Email Extraction: Instantly gathers email addresses from visited pages.
ðŸš€Easy Access & Display: Emails appear in the browser toolbar for easy viewing.
ðŸš€ Export in TXT Format: Export the collected emails with one click.

Ideal for sales teams, marketers, recruiters, bloggers, and small business owners, this extension helps streamline email outreach and boost efficiency. Say goodbye to manual email searches and let this tool save you time!
